params.name: topElement
params.desc: The XML element under which the records are contained

params.name: documentElement
params.desc: The XML element of the record

params.name: limitParam
params.desc: URL query parameter name to set a limit on how many items will be returned per call

params.name: limitValue
params.desc: The maximum number of records that will be returned at each call to the original resource

params.name: offsetParam
params.desc: URL query parameter name to specify from which record to start in subsequent calls to the original resource
